title: Mystic Forest Walker
tagline: A pixel-art RPG adventure in your browser
description: Explore a procedurally generated mystic forest. Battle enemies, level up, cast spells, and discover what lurks in the deepest parts of the woods. Built with Three.js pixel art. No downloads, no installs — just walk into the forest.

sections.content: A browser-based RPG set in a procedurally generated mystic forest. Walk, fight, cast magic, level up. No accounts, no downloads, no ads.

content: Procedural World: Every playthrough generates a different forest layout with unique encounters.
Pixel Art Style: Retro-styled sprites and environments rendered in Three.js.
Combat System: Fight enemies, earn XP, level up, and unlock new abilities.
Magic System: Cast spells to defeat tougher enemies deeper in the forest.
Mobile Friendly: D-pad and magic button controls work on touchscreens.

sections.content: Works best on mobile. Turn your volume up.
